attributes.action: No uk buisness with countries importing counterfeit goods & drugs.
attributes.additional_details: I dont understand why we do buisness with countries who bombard our country with drugs,pre curser drugs,counterfeit goods etc.If the buisness with them stops this will force them to tighten their practices.Our borders are in a mess daily & it still continues,only 50% of lorries at borders are searched! We need to freeze them,stopping the problem,only dealing with countries who are honest,we were a proud country,but im unsure.If we deal with other countries,we swap other problems.
